1598530.name: RPG Maker MZ - Futuristic Vehicles
1598530.description:
Welcome to the future with the Futuristic Vehicles pack by Rinober! In this pack you’ll find sleek looking futuristic cars that are perfect for creating the driving force behind your next adventure in RPG Maker. Included are various types of vehicles from more modern examples to those that would look right at home on a 22nd century racetrack. There are also two styles of police vehicles to keep your characters in check from going too fast! Does this pack contain the car of your main character’s dreams?

Features:

* TileA5 and TileB (train trucks, station, bike parking, signal etc)
* Futuristic cars: 18 kinds (with shadow and color variations included) 15 sheets total
* Normal cars: 16 kinds (with color variations included): 4sheets total
* Futuristic Train, Vehicle, Bus: 12 kinds total (with shadow and color variations included) 18 sheets total
* Police cars
* Gates and train crossing

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1598530.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
